imprint.take.noactionskills: With active skills, requires at least level %d Soul Resonance to activate.
imprint.take.hasactionskills: With active skills, press [%s] to release active skills.
imprint.actions.name: Activated
tooltip.eveninglament.paranoia1: Restores 10% of the damage dealt as health on each attack.
tooltip.eveninglament.paranoia2: Deals 20% extra damage to creatures below 40% health.
message.eveninglament.soul_eater_kill_co: §5Successfully devoured a creature, currently have devoured §r§6%d§r§5 creatures.
message.eveninglament.gamephase.break: §cYou cannot break this block yet. Hold shift to force break it.
engraving.eveninglament.relentless.desc: Has a 50% chance to ignore target's damage reduction.
engraving.eveninglament.celestial.desc: Creative mode flight, but consumes one durability every 30 seconds.
engraving.eveninglament.blood_mary.desc: Attacks inflict additional damage equal to 2.5% of the target's missing health.
engraving.eveninglament.soul_eater.desc: Killing creatures has a chance to permanently increase attack damage.
engraving.eveninglament.void_gift.desc: Converts a small amount of damage into void damage that ignores armor.
engraving.eveninglament.world_library.de: Converts fished items into random enchanted books. The quality is proportional to luck, but the durability consumption is increased.
engraving.eveninglament.spoon.desc: Your tools are treated as axes, shovels, and hoes.
